android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.description: Allows the application to access the phone features of the device. An application with this permission can determine the phone number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call is connected to and so on.

android.permission.CALL_PHONE.description: Allows the application to call phone numbers without your intervention. Malicious applications may cause unexpected calls on your phone bill. Note that this does not allow the application to call emergency numbers.

android.permission.READ_CONTACTS.description: Allows an application to read all of the contact (address) data stored on your phone. Malicious applications can use this to send your data to other people.

android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.description: Allows application to access the audio record path.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.description: Allows an application to show system-alert windows. Malicious applications can take over the entire screen of the phone.

android.permission.EXPAND_STATUS_BAR.description: Allows application to expand or collapse the status bar.

android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS.description: Allows application to modify global audio settings, such as volume and routing.

android.permission.FOREGROUND_SERVICE.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground

android.permission.ACCESS_NOTIFICATION_P.description: Marker permission for applications that wish to access notification policy.

android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS.description: Allows an application to access the list of accounts known by the phone.

android.permission.MANAGE_ACCOUNTS.description: Allows an application to perform operations like adding and removing accounts and deleting their password.

android.permission.BLUETOOTH.description: Allows an application to view configuration of the local Bluetooth phone and to make and accept connections with paired devices.

android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADMIN.description: Allows an application to configure the local Bluetooth phone and to discover and pair with remote devices.

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

manifest_analysis.title:
App has a Network Security Configuration
[android:networkSecurityConfig]
manifest_analysis.desc: The Network Security Configuration feature lets apps customize their network security settings in a safe, declarative configuration file without modifying app code. These settings can be configured for specific domains and for a specific app.
manifest_analysis.name: App has a Network Security Configuration [android:networkSecurityConfig]

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

manifest_analysis.title: Launch Mode of Activity (caller.live.freeapps.callrecorder.ui.activity.SplashActivity) is not standard.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity should not be having the launch mode attribute set to "singleTask/singleInstance" as it becomes root Activity and it is possible for other applications to read the contents of the calling Intent. So it is required to use the "standard" launch mode attribute when sensitive information is included in an Intent.
manifest_analysis.name: Launch Mode of Activity is not standard.

manifest_analysis.desc: A Service is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. playstore_details.title: Call Recorder - Automatic Call Recorder (NO-ROOT)
playstore_details.description:
Call Recorder, a free high-quality call recording app which gives you the easiest way to record all your phone calls, call conversations and no root needed.

Never worry about losing important call recordings! Record phone calls and save call recording with ease with this auto phone call recorder.This smart auto call recorder app is globally available helping thousands of users to record important phone calls from both sides.

By using Automatic Call Recorder, You can automatic record important calls and save any phone call you want, simple and smart. This Call Recorder can be used to record phone call, or record important calls from KAKAO, WhatsApp, Facebook, Line, Skype and more! 

Call Recorder  - Automatic Call Recorder (NO-ROOT) lets you easily record your incoming and outgoing phone calls from both sides.

►Call Recorder is an awesome advanced free call recorder application with these features:

- Easy to use
- Automatically record all incoming & outgoing calls, whenever and wherever
- High quality of the audio effect
- No root needed
- The most compatible tool with nearly all devices
- Organize your call records through call recorder
- Better support Pixel \ Samsung Galaxy S7 (Edge) \ Galaxy S8 (S8+) \  Galaxy S9 (S9+)

NO-ROOT NEEDED for Call Recorder
1. Record your calls automatically while calling.
2. You can play back, or save your call to mp3 files on your SD card and share to WhatsApp and Messenger with one click.
3. It’s FREE!

Record any phone call you want and choose which calls you to want to save by using the call recorder. You can set which calls are recorded and which are ignored. Listen to the recording, take notes and share it through auto call recorder.

There are three default settings for automatic recording by auto call recorder app:
Record everything (default) – This setting records all calls automatically except for contacts pre-selected to be ignored.
Ignore calls – This setting records no calls except for contacts pre-selected to be recorded.
Ignore contacts – This setting records all calls with people who are not contacts, except for contacts pre-selected to be recorded.

Auto call recorder allows you to record phone calls while on phone.
This automatic Call Recorder is a great Telephone Recording app for android,
Record any phone call you want, Choose which users or incoming\outgoing phone calls to record and choose which calls you want to save or share.

Other Key Features of Auto Call Recorder:
* Call Recorder automatic - record all your calls on auto-pilot.
* Easily manage all your recordings.
* Playback, or Share your phone recordings
* Sort recordings by names or group by dates.
* Reveal ID's of unknown callers automatically
* Search, sort and favorite your recordings
* High quality or the efficient file format of recordings

Try this reliable call recorder Now!
playstore_details.summary: High-quality automatic call recording free for Android, two-sided call recorder.
playstore_details.summaryHTML: High-quality automatic call recording free for Android, two-sided call recorder.
playstore_details.developerAddress: Rm 907 Silvercord Tower 2, 30 Canton Rd., Tsim Sha Tsui
